name: Stare Down
description:
Created for the 2019 Games Wales Community Jam

Stare Down is a 2 Player VS game where you try to outlast your opponent in a staring contest.

Player One uses WASD while Player Two uses the directional arrows. Match the direction of the Quick Time Event, but make sure its also you're corresponding colour, or else you'll lose a life.

Last player standing wins!

If your input aren't registering, just click on the screen a couple times
